text.name: sys_description
text.text: Rediscover all the great classics that have written the history of arcade games with MAME and FBA. Arcade gathers a selection of all the best titles in any medium. Pacman, Killer Instinct, Space Invaders, Pang or The Ninja Turtles ... Thousands of titles waiting for you on mythical arcade cabinets! Take advantage of the many benefits of emulators, like playing rare games, using graphical filters, being able to save, using cheat codes, but especially to play with an unlimited credit...
